225.movie_plot: The Shelleys visit Lord Byron and compete to write a horror story.

211.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

66.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

1.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

164.movie_plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

64.movie_plot: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

120.movie_plot: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

167.movie_plot: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

104.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
104.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

24.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

148.movie_plot: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

113.movie_plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

131.movie_plot: A race of space vampires arrive in London and infect the populace.

52.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

98.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

25.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

156.movie_plot: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

19.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

51.movie_plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

3.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
3.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

127.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

95.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
95.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

21.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

134.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

108.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

124.movie_plot: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

146.movie_plot: A sweet mother takes a little too much at heart for the defense of her family.

54.movie_plot: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

101.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

159.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

32.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

71.movie_plot: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

116.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

166.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.
